info.title: BKK Futar
info.description: Get and search planned and real-time information from the BKK FUTAR system - public transportation of Budapest - regarding journeys, vehicles, stops and many more!

get.description: List active disturbances corresponding to the search criteria

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A query string matched against disturbance title, description or identification.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start of time interval (epoch seconds) for the search.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End of time interval (epoch seconds) for the search.

stopIds.description: Array of found relevant stop IDs.
stopIds.title: Stop IDs

routeIds.description: Array of found relevant route IDs.
routeIds.title: Route IDs

alertIds.description: Array of found relevant alert IDs.
alertIds.title: Alert IDs

get.summary: Get arrivals and departures for stop
get.description: List arrivals and departures for selected stop

parameters.name: minutesBefore
parameters.description: Start of relevant time interval for query, substracted from 'time' parameter.

parameters.name: minutesAfter
parameters.description: End of relevant time interval for query, added to the 'time' parameter.

parameters.name: stopId
parameters.description: Stop ID to query data for, such as 'BKK_F01227'.

parameters.name: includeRouteId
parameters.description: List of comma separated route IDs to filter results.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp (epoch seconds) used for the query, defaulted to server time.

parameters.name: onlyDepartures
parameters.description: Indicate, whether return results with or without arrivals.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned results, defaulted to 60.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude information of the location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude information of the location.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of location around lat and lon coordinates.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query expression used to filter results.

routeIds.description: An array of the route IDs belonging to the stop.
routeIds.title: Route IDs

alertIds.description: An array of the alert IDs belonging to the stop.
alertIds.title: Alert IDs

nearbyStopIds.description: An array of the nearby Stop IDs.
nearbyStopIds.title: Nearby Stop IDs

stopHeadsign.description: The indicated destination in the stop.
stopHeadsign.title: Stop Headsign

arrivalTime.description: The planned arrival time in epoch seconds.
arrivalTime.title: Arrival Time

departureTime.description: The planned departure time in epoch seconds
departureTime.title: Departure Time

predictedArrivalTime.description: Predicted arrival time in epoch seconds, if the trip has realtime data.
predictedArrivalTime.title: Predicted Arrival

predictedDepartureTime.description: Predicted departure time in epoch seconds, if the trip has realtime data.
predictedDepartureTime.title: Predicted Departure

uncertain.description: Indication, whether the realtime data for the trip is uncertain.
uncertain.title: Uncertain

tripId.description: The relevant Trip ID for this entry.
tripId.title: Trip ID

serviceDate.description: The service date of the Trip, expressed in YYYYMMDD format.
serviceDate.title: Service Date

wheelchairAccessible.description: Indication, whether the Trip is wheelchair accessible.
wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair Accessible

mayRequireBooking.description: Indication, whether at least one of the next stops of the trip requires booking.
mayRequireBooking.title: May Require Booking

alertIds.description: The relevant alert IDs for the stop.
alertIds.title: Alert IDs

stopTimes.title: Stop Time
stopTimes.description: The stop schedule relevant for given stop.

get.description: Get information about Bicycle Rental Stations

bikes.description: Number of available bikes at the station.
bikes.title: Bikes

get.description: List the schedule for a selected stop

parameters.name: stopId
parameters.description: Stop ID to query data for, such as 'BKK_F01227'.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The requested date in YYYYMMDD format, such as 20230131, defaulted to today.

parameters.name: onlyDepartures
parameters.description: Indicate, whether return results with or without arrivals.

stopId.description: Unique ID of the requested stop.
stopId.title: Stop ID

date.description: Date of the requested schedule in YYYYMMDD format, such as 20230130.
date.title: Date

routeIds.description: Array of related route IDs for the schedule.
routeIds.title: Route IDs

alertIds.description: Array of related alert IDs for the stop
alertIds.title: Alert IDs

routeId.description: Relevant route ID for the schedule.
routeId.title: Route ID

groups.description: Combining the target stop and schedule details.
groups.title: Groups

items.title: Stop time
items.description: Details of a stop time within schedule.

stopTimes.description: Array of stop times and related details within the schedule.
stopTimes.title: Stop times

directions.description: Array of schedule data grouped by direction.
directions.title: Direction

schedules.description: Array of schedules related to the stop.
schedules.title: Schedule

get.description: List stops for a selected location, or all stops

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of the requested location, for example '47.497313'. If empty, returns all stops.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude of the requested location, for example '19.064639'. If empty, returns all stops.

parameters.name: latSpan
parameters.description: Latitude span for the requested location (lat +/- latSpan), for example '0.01336'.

parameters.name: lonSpan
parameters.description: Longitude span for the requested location (lon +/- lonSpan), for example '0.0321'.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: If latSpan or lonSpan are missing, search area is defined by adding radius (meters) to location.

vertex.description: The journey planner identification of the stop.
vertex.title: Vertex

direction.description: Direction of the stop, for example '-47'.
direction.title: Direction

locationType.description: The location type of the stop.
locationType.title: Location type

parentStationId.description: Unique ID of the parent station.
parentStationId.title: Parent station id

routeIds.description: Array of all routes containing the stop.
routeIds.title: Route IDs

alertIds.description: Array of active alert IDs related to the stop.
alertIds.title: Alert IDs

get.description: List vehicles, which are on a route containing the selected stop

parameters.name: stopId
parameters.description: Stop ID to query data for, such as 'BKK_F01227'.

parameters.name: ifModifiedSince
parameters.description: Return data, that has been modified since the UNIX timestamp.

stopSequence.description: Sequence of the current stop on the route of the vehicle.
stopSequence.title: Stop sequence

licensePlate.description: The license plate  of the vehicle.
licensePlate.title: License plate

deviated.description: True, if the vehicle has deviated from route.
deviated.title: Deviated

lastUpdateTime.description: Timestamp (unix) of the last available real-time data for the vehicle.
lastUpdateTime.title: Last update time

status.description: Status of the vehicle, such as INCOMING_AT.
status.title: Status

stopDistancePercent.description: Where is the vehicle between 2 stops, in percentage.
stopDistancePercent.title: Stop distance percent

wheelchairAccessible.description: True, if the vehicle is accessible with wheelchair.
wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair accessible

vertex.description: Unique identification of the trip for journey planner
vertex.title: Vertex

TextResponse.description: The detailed response text related to the status code.
TextResponse.title: Text

LimitExceededResponse.description: Indication, whether response contains more elements than the defined limit.
LimitExceededResponse.title: Limit Exceeded

agencyId.description: Agency ID relevant for the route.
agencyId.title: Agency ID

wheelchairBoarding.description: Indication, whether wheelchair boarding is possible.
wheelchairBoarding.title: Wheelchair Boarding

routeIds.description: Array of relevant Route IDs for the stop.
routeIds.title: Route IDs

wheelchairAccessible.description: Indication, whether the trip is wheelchair accessible.
wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair Accessible

modifiedTime.description: Last modification timestamp (seconds) for the alert.
modifiedTime.title: Modified Time

url.description: URLs containing relevant details with translations.
url.title: URL

header.description: Relevant header text for the alert with translations.
header.title: Header

dialectParam.name: dialect
dialectParam.description: The dialect of the API references, defaulted to otp.

appVersionParam.name: appVersion
appVersionParam.description: The version of the client application.

minResultParam.name: minResult
minResultParam.description: The minimum number of elements returned.
